column2: "I hear that people forget to set their techniques all the time. "
"You can also set them in your subpalette, but it's important to set your main ones up in the weapon palette."
"If you forget to set them, you won't be able to use them, even if you want to! What a waste, huh?"
"What about you? You're not happy just learning them, are you? You want to use techniques, too, don't you?"
"I don't want to be pushy or anything, but why don't you try setting a tech in the weapon palette?"
"アフィンから『レスタ Lv.1』を受け取りました。"
